  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE1274</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Birkat Hamazon10</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Birkat Hamazon10</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Birkat Hamazon10</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Birkat Hamazon10</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Birkat Hamazon10</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Birkat Hamazon10</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Birkat Hamazon10</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">In this lesson, Birkat Hamazon will be used as a springboard to other Jewish texts. learners will study and analyze the biblical sources found in Birkat Hamazon.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Birkat Hamazon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">prayer</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">lookstein center</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">mitzvot</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">In dieser Lektion wird Birkat Hamazon als 
Sprungbrett zu anderen jüdischen Texten verwendet, die Anfänger 
die biblischen Quellen studieren und analysieren, die in Birkat 
Hamazon gefunden werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dans cette leçon, Birkat Hamazon sera utilisé 
comme tremplin à d'autres textes juifs que les étudiants étudieront
et analyseront les sources bibliques trouvées dans Birkat Hamazon.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Nesta lição, Birkat Hamazon será usado como um 
trampolim a outros textos que jewish os learners estudarão e 
analisarão as fontes biblical encontradas em Birkat Hamazon.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In questa lezione, Birkat Hamazon sarà usato come 
springboard ad altri testi ch'ebrei i principianti studeranno e che 
analizzeranno le sorgenti bibliche trovate in Birkat Hamazon.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σε αυτό το μάθημα, Birkat Hamazon θα 
χρησιμοποιηθεί δεδομένου ότι μια αφετηρία σε άλλους εβραϊκούς 
αρχαρίους κειμένων θα μελετήσει και θα αναλύσει τις βιβλικές 
πηγές που βρίσκονται σε Birkat Hamazon.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En esta lección, Birkat Hamazon será utilizado 
como trampolín a otros textos judíos que los principiantes 
estudiarán y que analizarán las fuentes bíblicas encontradas en 
Birkat Hamazon.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Birkat Hamazon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gebet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">lookstein Mitte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">mitzvot</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
